data.event: It became a town on 25 June 1752 when founded by José de Zárate during a military campaign known as "La Valerosa".
In 1777 viceroy Pedro de Cevallos proposed moving the town, but actually it was moved to its present location by viceroy Juan José de Vértiz on 8 May 1779.

event.title: was moved to its present location by viceroy Juan José de Vértiz on 8 May 1779
